      • createButton

        public static javafx.scene.image.ImageView createButton(javafx.scene.Group root,
                                                        java.lang.String path,
                                                        java.lang.String fileName,
                                                        int x,
                                                        int y,
                                                        int sz)
        Template to create a hoverable button.
        Parameters:
        root - The root of the scene.
        path - The path to the normal and hover button images.
        fileName - The name of the image files.
        x - The x coordinate to place the button
        y - The y coordinate to place the button
        sz - The width of the button (ratio is preserved)
        Returns:
        The button object so events can be added to it.

      • createBackgroundImage

        public static javafx.scene.image.ImageView createBackgroundImage(java.lang.String path)
        Template to create a background image.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the background image.
        Returns:
        The background image object.
